tool_description: Generates personalized onboarding plans for new volunteers based on their role, experience level, and organizational requirements.

volunteer_id.description: ID of the volunteer to create onboarding plan for

assigned_role.description: Specific role assigned to the volunteer

experience_level.description: Volunteer's experience level: beginner, intermediate, advanced

available_hours.description: Hours per week volunteer has available

accelerated_track.description: Whether volunteer qualifies for accelerated onboarding

error_messages: Invalid volunteer ID: Volunteer ID does not exist in the system.
Invalid experience level: Experience level must be beginner, intermediate, or advanced.
Invalid hours: Available hours must be between 1 and 40 per week.
Invalid start date: Start date must be a future date in ISO 8601 format.
Role not recognized: The assigned role is not in the organization's role database.
usage: Provide volunteer ID, assigned role, experience level, available hours, and start date. Optionally specify special requirements, mentor assignment, and accelerated track eligibility.

onboarding_plan_id.description: Unique identifier for the onboarding plan

plan_duration_weeks.description: Expected duration of onboarding in weeks

assigned_mentor_id.description: ID of assigned mentor if mentor assignment is enabled

checklist_items.description: Checklist of onboarding tasks to complete
